title: Star Wreck III: Time Warped
description: The third book in the bestselling series parodying America's favorite science fiction TV show. The crews of Captain Smirk and Captain Jean-Lucy Ricardo blunder through the timeline to retrieve a videotape accidentally transported into the future--which has spawned a bizarre "wrekkie" cult of U.S.S. Endocrine crew wanna-bes.
author: Leah Rewolinski
